description: I'm a Programmer / Analyst working in warehousing and logistics. I'm passionate about both Application and Web Development, where I strive to solve dynamic problems using a wide range of technology from Javascript, C# and BASIC to AWS Cloud solutions and a multitude of database technologies. I'm currently working on getting certified as an AWS Solutions Architect.
detailOrQuote: As I expand and refine my technical acumen, I continue to see new ways to solve problems both new and old. I love a good challenge and always look forward to improving someone's life experience with technology.
